dmca.title: bootleg audio file
dmca.body:
From:  Mike Wright
Date:  11/8/05 2:13 pm
To:  questions@loomia.com
Subj:  bootleg audio file

Hello,

My name is Mike Wright. I represent JZ Knight and JZK, Inc., the producer and copyright holder of the DVD "Create Your Day."

http://www.loomia.com/media/audio?cp=/652400/738907
<http://www.loomia.com/media/audio?cp=/652400/738907%20has%20a%20bootlegg%20m
p3>
has a bootleg file of the audio track of the copyrighted DVD. Please remove from your site.

If you have any questions, please let me know.

Thanks,

Mike 

---

Mike Wright, Manager
Product Sales and Services
Ramtha's School of Enlightenment
A division of JZK, Inc.
360.458.5201, ext. 30
http://www.ramtha.com
